column1: Fundamental Rule @ . @ No matter what weird situations the cards create
column2: victory can only be achieved by an actual mate position
column3: and never by a simple <King's Capture>. The move creating the mate situation may well have been allowed by the play of a card
column4: but the position itself must be mate.@ . @ A few details @ . @When the term <Piece> is used in the text of a card
column5: it designates all the pieces of the game
column7: Kings and Pawns included. If a card's effect excludes certain pieces
column8: this is specified in the card's text.;Régle Fondamentale @ . @ Quelles que soient les situations bizarres créées par les cartes
